Sentencas: The chemical industry is a major carbon emitter in China and must be focused on for China to achieve its goal of carbon neutralization.
Titulo: CO2 High-Temperature Electrolysis Technology Toward Carbon Neutralization in the Chemical Industry

Sentencas: Carbon dioxide (CO2) high-temperature electrolysis based on solid oxide electrolysis cells (SOECs) is an important technology to achieve China's carbon emission reduction, peak carbon emission, and carbon neutralization goals.
Titulo: CO2 High-Temperature Electrolysis Technology Toward Carbon Neutralization in the Chemical Industry

Sentencas: Moreover, this technology can realize the recycling utilization of CO2 and thereby contribute to considerable environmental benefits and potential economic benefits.
Titulo: CO2 High-Temperature Electrolysis Technology Toward Carbon Neutralization in the Chemical Industry

Sentencas: Thus far, a great deal of progress has been made in CO2 high-temperature electrolysis technol-ogy at the laboratory stage and pilot stage, although the large-scale industrial application of this technol-ogy still requires further development.
Titulo: CO2 High-Temperature Electrolysis Technology Toward Carbon Neutralization in the Chemical Industry

Sentencas: This review focuses on recent progress in state-of-the-art cell materials for high-temperature CO2 electrolysis, discusses the future research directions of SOEC technologies, and proposes possible SOEC-coupled chemical industry carbon neutralization solutions.(c) 2022 THE AUTHORS.
Titulo: CO2 High-Temperature Electrolysis Technology Toward Carbon Neutralization in the Chemical Industry

Titulo: CO2 High-Temperature Electrolysis Technology Toward Carbon Neutralization in the Chemical Industry
